sentences.en: But almost all the proposed threshold group signature scheme can not resist the collusive attack.
sentences.cn: 但现有的门限群签名方案几乎都存在无法抵御合谋攻击的缺陷.

sentences.en: Collusive price leadership characterizes oligopolistic markets.
sentences.cn: 串通式价格领导具有寡占市场的特征.

sentences.en: How to defense collusive attack is one of the key problems when designing fingerprinting algorithms.
sentences.cn: 抗合谋攻击是数字指纹技术中需要解决的关键问题之一.

sentences.en: Pricing decisions made in a collusive atmosphere come close to monopoly pricing.
sentences.cn: 在勾结的情况下制定的价格,接近于垄断价格.
